title: Title
product_description: The Heavy Weight Free Spirit Oversized T-shirt is designed for individuals who live passionately and fearlessly. It features a neck arc detail for a luxurious, future-forward look. Made from a heavy-weight cotton blend with a weight of 300-320 GSM, it is ideal for those who break boundaries. The shirt is available in sizes XS to XXL. It is made in India and requires machine washing inside out in cold water with mild detergent. The male model shown is 6.0 and wears a size L.
product_care_description: Machine wash inside out in cold water, use mild detergent. Dry and iron inside out, avoid fabric softeners.
